price: Àwọn ojú ọ̀nà méje ń bẹ fún (iná). Àtúnpín tún wà fún ojú-ọ̀nà kọ̀ọ̀kan.
arabic: لَهَا سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡوَٰبٖ لِّكُلِّ بَابٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ جُزۡءٞ مَّقۡسُومٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lahā sabʿatu abwābin likulli bābin min'hum juz'on maqsūmun
